title: Mexico 75: no place else in the world to be

abstract: Mexico '75 is a record of the International Women's Year conference in Mexico City and the role of the Australian delegates mixing with other prominent women such as Betty Frieden and Imelda Marcos.
description: A record of the International Women's Conference in Mexico City in 1975. The film sets the Conference in the context of an underdeveloped country and discusses the relevance of the women's movement to third world countries. There is special emphasis on the contribution of the Australian delegation.
